text: Abracadabra is the 12th studio album by Steve Miller Band. It was released on 15 June, 1982 through Capital Records. It went to number 1 in Germany, number 3 in Sweden and the United States, number 4 in Canada and number 10 in the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1982 albums Category:Steve Miller Band albums Category:Capitol Records albums
title: Abracadabra (Steve Miller Band album)
